text: Erwin Waldner (24 January 1933 – 18 April 2015) was a German footballer. He played for five teams between 1952 and 1967, including VfB Stuttgart. Walder was born in Nürtingen, Baden-Württemberg. He died there on 18 April 2015, aged 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2015 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Sportspeople from Baden- Württemberg
title: Erwin Waldner
